div.em: The mission of the Monroe Public Schools is to create a student-centered environment where all learners maximize their intellectual, creative, social, emotional, and physical potential.

div.p:
COVID-19 Emergency Meal Program is offered to any child age 18 or younger.
New meal pick up procedure & sign up for the week of April 20, 2020. Click here for more information and link to sign up.
